name: Swords, Shields and Magic
description:
Swords, Shields and Magic is a Dungeon Crawler with Rock Paper Scissors type of combat. There is a final enemy you can kill.

How to play: Press Space to Move, Hold Space to Rotate Right

Menu's: Press Space to Change Selection, Hold Space to Select

Credits:

@Val40

@Rototype
